website_summaries.verdict: Large yet lightweight, this elegant mirror is versatile enough to be transferred to any room.
pros: This mirror lends a graceful air to any room
Lightweight design and decorative frame are its standout features
cons: Construction is not as sturdy as some would like

customer_reviews.title: i can move it around my room easily. Looks very stylish and expensive
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this mirror, its so big yet very light, i can move it around my room easily. Looks very stylish and expensive. Very worth it.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyAO

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Classy Mirror
customer_reviews.text: We needed a mirror for over our double sinks. Large mirrors like this can be so expensive, but this one was very reasonably priced. This mirror can be hung both horizontally or vertically, and has a very classy look to it. The first mirror arrived damaged, but the seller was quick to send a replacement. Overall we are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: grasso

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror!!!!! The first one came cracked, but the company took it back with no issue and sent me out a new one ASAP. I don't have a headboard for my bed so I decided to put the mirror above it. Kind of feels like I am a hotel now, LOL. Great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love the mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does mirror look great, but I received it so quickly! I was a little hesitant with buying a mirror online as I like to see things like this in person, but so glad I did! Great size and mirror doesn't distort at all.
customer_reviews.author: EMT Jr

customer_reviews.title: fits another wall which actually looks better. The corner seams are tight
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery! I didn't realize how big it is...didn't fit wall I originally intended it for but, fits another wall which actually looks better. The corner seams are tight. The frame looks very nice. One issue...black stain or scratch cannot be removed. Tried scraping with my nails and cleaning solution with no success. ***UPDATE*** 4 stars to 5 stars for Excellent Customer Service!
customer_reviews.author: Link37

customer_reviews.title: An excellent buy and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror! Beautiful quality and finish. Looked around several stores for a stand up mirror. Those that I found, were cheaper and narrower. When my mirror arrived, I was delighted because it was beautifully packaged. I was impressed by the way the mirror was cushioned within the box. There was not one scratch, ding, nor tear! Kudos to the design company and kudos to all the Shipping Associates involved, who securely packed my mirror and had it shipped! Excellent job and thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Foody!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror. Seems like a lot of negative reviews are for mirror received broken. That is not a true product review. Love it! For the price of it you cannot go wrong. Everyone that has seen it thinks it cost double that.
customer_reviews.author: Phobos718

customer_reviews.title: Reflection shows true with no distortion
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mirror in champagne but painted over it in silver. Very good mirror, I hung it up with French cleats, which are much easier and way more secure than just hanging with D rings. Mirror shows true, zero distortion, not as heavy as it looks, fast shipping, good price. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: L.D.

customer_reviews.title: Dishonest representation of product
customer_reviews.text: This product description is intentionally misleading. While the mirror is attractive, it is a plastic frame. Nowhere in the product description is the plastic listed as a material. I will not buy from this dishonest manufacturer again. It’s just wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Woebbeking

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is an important piece in our update of a hall bathroom. It just looks so nice! Sturdy too. The mirror was well-packaged and delivered on time. (That was important because it allowed me to have our contractor hang it while he was here for other work.) I ordered Champagne. It was a little more golden than I expected (as opposed to "pure" silver) but I quickly found it worked well with rest of the decor.
customer_reviews.author: SAN People

customer_reviews.title: Frame is cheap looking plastic
customer_reviews.text: I was not aware when I ordered this mirror that the frame is plastic. It makes the mirror look cheap, especially because the mitered corners are off and are not tight. A wooden frame would be better, and I would have been willing to pay more for a classier look with wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror and just the size I wanted - HUGE! Full body and then some. Espresso looks great. Hanging was a little tricky to get it level. Its also very heavy so make sure you are using appropriate hardware if wall hanging, especially on drywall. I have mine over just drywall with large anchors and so far so good. Arrived with no damage, packed tightly with protective packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my guest bathroom, the frame looks cheap and there are gaps at all the corner joints. I kept it because I need it to stage my home to sell but if this were for long term use for myself I would have returned it. The actual mirror part looks small due to the large amount of space taken up by the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror! We just bought a new house and needed a big mirror to reflect light and open up our dining room. We had bought several other items from Sandberg furniture on Wayfair so we decided to purchase this one compared to a few others we were looking at. I was surprised how fast it arrived. It said maybe a few weeks and came in two days. It is big but not overly heavy as some have said. Love the color. It is perfect in our dining room. I'd definitely recommend it to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Mirror
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is very nice, bought to update bathroom mirrors. I was a little disappointed the frames were like plastic, but they look very nice, and are lighter to hang than if they would have been wood. I bought two mirrors and had to do adjustments for hanging because the back hangers were 1/2 in. different from one side to the other. ugh, but all worked out and look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jane H

customer_reviews.title: Distorted image
customer_reviews.text: I hate to leave a negative review but I was slightly disappointed after receiving this product. The mirror looks more expensive than the cost. However, the mirror itself does not work well. When up close, the reflection looks OK but when you move further back like 3 or 4 feet or more, my image begins to get distorted. This is what I am rating since to me this is its purpose. I would return or exchange it but the box is huge and would be a big hassle to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Gulmatico

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in perfect condition and is exactly what i was looking for. It's hanging on the wall now and looks just how I had pictured it. Very happy with this purchase. More affordable than what I could find locally and front-door delivery was a bonus. And I repurposed the excellent packaging to ship some framed art.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful large mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I got my order through UPS, and it Took forever to get my package . I had some issues receiving my package first It didn't arrive on time.Then there was a notice that said they would try again the next day, then it arrive two hours before the time it was expected. And off course I wasn't home. Finally had to call UPS to get my package. The package was very well secured inside the box. I read some reviews and, some people said that their mirror was broken when they received their package. That was not the case with me. My mirror wasn't broken. It's perfect and large you'll love it. I've received lost of complements.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great frame and love the beveled edge on the glass
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love the look of this mirror in my closet. My husband was skeptical about using an expensive mirror in a closet, but he's pleasantly surprised at the difference it makes. It's much larger than normal closet mirrors and makes the closet redo he did in our large walk-in closet look professional. It's also much easier to see an outfit in the wider mirror. You can back up from this mirror and still see really well. Glad we put the money into it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer since 1996

customer_reviews.title: At 7 months, broke apart at frame corner, shattered
customer_reviews.text: Such a disappointment to walk in and find the frame still hanging but broken, and the mirror shattered on the floor. I'm guessing it's too late to get our $$ back? Check the joints well if you have this. Maybe reinforce? Too bad, it was pretty.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey tingley

customer_reviews.title: damaged with issue to return
customer_reviews.text: mirror came damaged, very cheap and light but the problem is the seller gave me return shipping to USPS but USPS won't accept the return because the box size exceeds their limit. So I have no way to return it back to the seller and get my money back. very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Huang

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mirror and was exactly what I was looking for. Nice looking frame and a very good looking product. Finish is excellent. Was a little nervous ordering a mirror to be shipped but the item was shipped quickly and arrived very well packed and in perfect condition. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I've been eyeing this mirror for months and I'm glad I finally bought it! This is a lovely mirror, and it arrived in perfect condition. Its the perfect size to serve as a full-body leaner, but it's not too heavy to move around if needed. The color of the frame is nice but not too gaudy or ridiculous. Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Icee Etheridge

customer_reviews.title: good packaging protected it and came in tact Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: huge, wide mirror; good packaging protected it and came in tact Cons: corners seams could be tighter; backing did not have hanging loops pre installed you have to do it yourself but they do provide the hardware; the color is a rose gold/light bronze but the website description says "silver" but I kept it anyway since it was too much of a hassle to return and pro's outweighed cons
customer_reviews.author: YouDontKillMoney

customer_reviews.title: A tad large...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful mirror, but as shown above, I ordered the 36” model. Imagine my surprise to find a six foot box waiting for me when I got home today. A friend is happy - he now has a 65” mirror for $70! I, on the other hand, still need a mirror for my guest bath. Not sure if I want to chance ordering this one again, but it is a good buy... <sigh>
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: We bought it for the size and it is perfect. The frame is not the best quality as ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for the size and it is perfect. The frame is not the best quality as far as the mitered joints.
customer_reviews.author: J Wilder

customer_reviews.title: I received this mirror today and am so happy I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: I received this mirror today and am so happy I purchased it! It looks very nice in our master bedroom, leaning against the wall. I'm thinking about having my husband hang it on the wall, but either way, it looks amazing! The mirror was extremely well packaged and arrived in perfect condition. Totally happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: sandragb

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice with the bevels. The corners gaps are not 100% tight, but close enough considering what you pay for. I like that it's made of plastic since it's hung in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Macberto

customer_reviews.title: Took a risk and it was worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was soooooo scared it was going to be damaged when I received but it came with not ONE scratch. I was so relieved. The mirror is perfect and makes the room look very elegant. worth the risk lol.. I want to order it again in another color for my walk in closet!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it was all good. The mirror itself is well made
customer_reviews.text: The mirror arrived quickly and packed really well. The shipping box was damaged but with the packing, it was all good. The mirror itself is well made, and the white is a great shade of white -- has depth without being too bright white. Definitely would recommend if you need a large mirror to add to your bedroom decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tall and classy
customer_reviews.text: This mirror adds a classy look to any room. I have it leaning against my bedroom wall with a Pier 1 faux snow leopard fur chair. Usually I prefer light colors, but the bronze look matches my hardware and just doesn't darken the room at all. Very lovely piece of furniture at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant yet simple floor mirror for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely floor mirror for a great price! I purchased the champagne silver and I love the color. The mirror arrived in a nicely packed box so there weren’t any cracks or damage to the mirror or frame. I also bought these mirrors in white for the physician’s office that I work in. Easy to hang on the wall. I plan on purchasing another mirror for my bedroom in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quality Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful mirror. Thick and good quality. I thought that it would have been a little taller (but that’s my own fault for not measuring). I also would have preferred a stand...but it is a solid mirror and leans against the wall solidly on its own.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, even better price!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this mirror! Great value very sturdy, beautiful beveled edges and was packaged very well. Don't hesitate to buy this mirror, you will be satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: momof3

customer_reviews.title: I love it because its a huge mirror and its flattering
customer_reviews.text: I love it because its a huge mirror and its flattering, but the white is really not nice material and one corner is chipped
customer_reviews.author: eaqm562

customer_reviews.title: Vanity mirror
customer_reviews.text: I used this mirror in my bathroom over the sink. The color is perfect as it pulls the silver and gold tones in my granite. I actually bought the larger one as well for the matching double vanity. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jbkone

customer_reviews.title: Lovely mirror
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror, reasonable price, fast shipping. 65” expected it is not light. Placed two of these over long counter in ladies bathroom remodel at our church.
customer_reviews.author: smccraw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a bathroom we remodeled, it looks very nice and we are pleased with how well it goes with the vanity and light fixture we bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gold Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase! I ordered the gold version and couldn’t be more satisfied. It has the look and feel of a more expensive product. It’s not super lightweight, but I don’t mind - it seems more secure leaning that way and less likely to be knocked over. I wanted to find a gold full length mirror for around $100.00 and this one feels like a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: OBN

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived on time and in perfect condition. Other reviews had me concerned but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and in perfect condition. Other reviews had me concerned but it appears much better in person. Mitered corners are perfect...no gaps or scratches. It is very heavy and may require two people to hang...has a quality look.
customer_reviews.author: Cheleoxo

customer_reviews.title: Size.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these mirrors, they are a very nice item ..... but, be aware they are not 36”x30”, they are 35”x29”. This may not be an issue for most people but I bought them for a very specific sized place, we have had to be inventive to make them work.
customer_reviews.author: Rozlyn N.

customer_reviews.title: No damages
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror, hung it in the wall and had to have help with it , couldn't do it myself because it was heavy and long
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Girl

customer_reviews.title: High quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Put in my bedroom and looks great. I can finally see my entire body at once! I can actually get dressed and see what my whole outfit looks like. The mirror quality is very good with good clarity and not warped.
customer_reviews.author: PCA34

customer_reviews.title: Looking for Glam?
customer_reviews.text: Honestly exceeded my expectations. The mirror itself is beautiful, not too heavy, looks expensive and is perfect for selfies! :) Im 5’3 and it’s taller than me by a few inches, which works great, but if you’re 6’0 or up you may be a little tall for just placing it on the floor like I did. I bought some stick on LED lights made for vanity mirrors, and the result came out amazing - looks like I have a full on Hollywood glam station. Super happy, would recommend 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Romina Kirchmaier

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wall Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, simple design in this mirror. It looks much more expensive than it actually cost. The quality and finish of the wood is as described. The mirror quality itself is excellent. It was packaged really well and delivered as promised. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fenwick Farm

customer_reviews.title: CLASS FOR LESS CASH
customer_reviews.text: IT LOOKS GREAT & FITS RIGHT WHERE WE WANTED IT. THERE WAS A DENT IN THE FRAME, NOT EVIDENT IN THE PACKAGING, HOWEVER, SINCE IT WAS IN THE TOP OF THE FRAME, IT WAS NOT EASILY SEEN UNLESS YOU WERE 7 FEET TALL, SO WE DECIDED NOT TO RETURN IT.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Heck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was packaged really well. I was worried as I saw many posts with damaged products, but mine arrived perfect. I think it's worth the risk, this is a beautiful mirror that is very well priced.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this mirror! It arrived in perfect shape with no breakage, and it looks amazing in our room. The finish is beautiful, and the beveled edge gives this mirror a very elegant appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Dot Calm

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror exactly what I expected came in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Lataya smith

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: I saw a similar one in walmart right after this one arrived and it was way cheaper but it was also lighter. This one is heavy which is what I wanted. It looks amazing in the walkn in closet we just finished decorating
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: price perfect' craftmanship superb excellent fit for over vanity if you are not over 5ft3in GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror. Arrived perfectly through shipping. Easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: It’s not 36x30
customer_reviews.text: This item came packaged very well, no damage at all. It’s a good looking mirror for the price but I was disappointed that the actual size is 35x29. I bought it based on the exact size. I needed it to cover the mess on the wall from the previous mirror and this one didn’t measure up! I was able to return it and get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clements

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MIRROR!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS MIRROR! It’s lightweight so I can move it around if needed but sturdy enough so I know it won’t fall over. I have it leaning against my wall and have had no issues. This isn’t the best picture, but it’s huge. I put LED lights around mine which make it even better.
customer_reviews.author: SDS

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Hanging on the wall of a walk in closet. My wife loves it. I used a French Cleat to mount it; made it a lot easier because the mirror is quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Noca

customer_reviews.title: Large !
customer_reviews.text: Great Mirror ! Very large you can see your entire body and decently wide its great. I wanted a very large mirror and this size is perfect. I just lean it on my wall and good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror at an excellent price. Packaging was secure and the mirrors arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking mirror of poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Mirror came well packaged and looked nice and rich on the wall and I liked it allot till the first time I cleaned it. The mirror glaze has manufacturing defect right at the eye level, making it look cheap and of poor quality! I did not expect to find any defects let alone missing glaze spots on the brand new item at this price level and considering the size of the mirror returning it is out of the question. I guess I am stuck looking at the missing glaze for the rest of the mirror's life.
customer_reviews.author: alrise

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice looking mirror but is poorly put together
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with the quality of the mirror. I received my 1st mirror and two of the corners had a big gap and I returned it and ordering a new one and now all 4 corners have a gap where the edges are supposed to come together. It is a nice looking mirror but is poorly put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good mirror. It reflects things. Seriously though, it's a beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wasilewski

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is - lovely! I loved my recent purchase of this floor free standing mirror. I was so nervous about receiving my package damaged. But it was well packed and arrived all in tact. This is truly a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Meg T

customer_reviews.title: Always wanted one
customer_reviews.text: I absobluty love it, I want another one for my bedroom and it's at a cheaper price than home depot
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wishes Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Shattered Dreams
customer_reviews.text: The mirror arrived on my doorstep shattered into several pieces, I was heartbroken! The frame for the mirror is absolutely gorgeous and it would have been everything I had wanted...but sadly today I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: L. Howes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty mirror
customer_reviews.text: Tall sturdy mirror. I leaned it against the wall and it serves me well. Very stylish looking and great packing! Not a single scratch or break on the glass or frame.
customer_reviews.author: Lequia Beck

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is for my bathroom. In my opinion, it is a bit overpriced. It is a little cheesy looking in person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Pretty expensive. Solid wood mirrors were cheaper than this mirror but I needed this size and this was the only one I could find. Very over priced but it’s nice I guess.
customer_reviews.author: dpie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: Just redid our master bathroom. The oil rubbed bronze frame matches our fixtures perfectly. The mirrors are very high quality. Easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: It's such a great mirror, very heavy though, I couldn't hang it myself.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Was I surprised! This mirror far exceeded my expectations. It's beautiful and heavy duty. Meets my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Love my new bathroom mirror. It is much prettier than I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she loved it as did her kids.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: OJCommerce is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror works perfectly over my couch. It made it all the way from LA to SW Michigan with no damage at all. Great packaging job by OJCommerce! You’re the best. Although the box was punctured and left on my doorstep in the rain for hours, the mirror is in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Drogowski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect full length mirror
customer_reviews.text: beautiful mirror, perfect height and width to see your full body in, I currently have it prop'ed against a wall however would look great as a fixture
customer_reviews.author: Dana Hagood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vanity mirror for upsacle bath
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, sturdy and great price. What more could you want.
customer_reviews.author: iopdoc

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than description states.
customer_reviews.text: Actually smaller than it stated. It's an inch thinner and an inch shorter than what it states.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Carstens

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE FROM THIS 3rd Party!!! You won’t be able to return
customer_reviews.text: I purchased mirrors and pictures weren’t exactly accurate and neither was description. It would cost me more to return mirrors than what they cost me due to lousy representation and return and refund policy. Now I’m stuck with mirrors and out of the money for them👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Love :)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two mirrors. One mirror came perfect the other came shattered. They sent me a replacement and the replacement came perfect. These mirrors are the best. I am so glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect measurements
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is nice, I’m just so disappointed that is actually 29” instead of 30” as described. While one inch might not sound like a big deal- I REALLLLLYYY NEEDED THIS TO BE 30”.
customer_reviews.author: TheStuders

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I was so scared that it would arrive broken but it didn't! I eventually want to hang it on the wall. Haven't gotten around to it because I need to paint my room. So glad I got rid of my dorm room mirror and upgraded to a REAL mirror lol
customer_reviews.author: Tamera

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Showed up and both sides of frame were broken. I’m a single mom of 3 and no part of me wants to box this up yo return it. I’m so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jen Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong without being heavy
customer_reviews.text: Matches the brown and brushed bronze theme I'm going for beautifully. Easy to mount and work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight. But it’s huge and I love The rose gold! Perfect for all your OOTD ;)
customer_reviews.author: Adria Quiroz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice For Bathroom Renovation
customer_reviews.text: We recently redecorated our bathroom and this mirror was the perfect choice. Because, I have always purchased heavier mirrors, when this one arrived, I wasn't sure if I would like it or not. However, it was much easier to hang than it's heavier couterparts and looks absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Mirror damaged
customer_reviews.text: Perfect body mirror but received damaged like the painting was scratched off and had finger prints on the actual glass. I would return but don’t want to rebox too much of a hassle. Not happy with the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror! It is good quality and very large. It turned out to be exactly what I was looking for. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jlt10k

customer_reviews.title: Really elegant - looks like an expensive antique
customer_reviews.text: Really elegant - looks like an expensive antique! And the plus is that it is very light weight and easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: carol s

customer_reviews.title: Great for mud room entry way
customer_reviews.text: Great for mud room entry way, came very well packaged with tons of FRAGILE all over the box. Was a bit tricky to hang but we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie L. Falcone

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is a nice additional to our remodeled bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. Very stylish as well as being practical. Looks great and is a nice additional to our remodeled bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Large Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful mirror, well worth the money! I screwed hinges to the side/back of mine and use it as a cover. Sturdy and packaged very well! The frame has a deep curve which I like and feel it gives it a more expensive look (see photos).
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Very large the picture is deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to understand the measurements. It turned out way bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah wisniewski

customer_reviews.title: All 4 Corner seams look unfinished.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the white mirror. The corner seems all have a small space between them. I haven't hung it yet, I'm going to use bathroom white caulking and see how it looks. Over all beautiful mirror but the plastic will probably crack easily if dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror. First one delivered had a minor defect. Replaced without any hassle. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is a BEAUTIFUL MIRROR!! Very heavy and well made. I really love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: suzie

customer_reviews.title: NO!
customer_reviews.text: Poor miter job on all 4 corners. Very slow shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sir

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror has a beveled mirror and very pretty frame.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love thisnitem. Excellent quality. Shipped great! So glad I got this!
customer_reviews.author: RachelAdams

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Mirror arrived in perfect condition (from west coast to east coast). Very well packaged. The mirror is beautiful and I am very pleased. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a home build and it was perfect and affordable. Looks nice and good quality. Will buy more for next home build!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Tiehen

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and well made. No warped images in glass. Fast delivery and came in great condition. Bought the white version. Perfect for my mother in law’s new room. Color is true to white and not off white. Great mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: what a deal! love this mirror. packaged great and shipped quick.
customer_reviews.author: NY Mom of Four

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love 😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised of the size of the mirror when I first got it, but omg this mirror is the new love of my life. It has enhances my room so much if your having doubts please don’t I received my mirror in a timely manner and all I can say is that it’s worth the price and if your an photo connoisseur/ selfie taking queen like myself trust me it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

product_meta.title: Sandberg Furniture Oil Rubbed Bronze Wall Mirror, 36" x 30"
product_meta.description: Color:Oil Rubbed Bronze| Size:36" x 30" Wall MirrorThis beautiful rectangular wall mirror creates a warm atmosphere with large scale, elegant curves, and a touch of softness from the beveled glass. Perfect to be wall-mounted mirror for the living room, bedroom, hallway, or bathroom. Mirror can be hung either Vertically or Horizontally. D-ring hooks are provided on the back of the mirror in order to be hung without the use of a wire. Overall dimensions: 36 inches high x 30 inches wide x 2 inches deep; glass dimensions: 28 inches high x 22 inches wide; product materials: polystyrene, glass
feature_bullets: Can be mounted vertically or horizontally
D-ring brackets are provided for hanging without the use of a wire
Rectangular mirror measures 36 inches high x 30 inches wider x 2 inches deep; glass surface measures 28 inches high x 22 inches wider
